refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The command nix-collect-garbage is mostly an alias of nix-store --gc, that is, it deletes all unreachable paths in the Nix store to clean up your system. However, it provides an additional option -d (--delete-old) that deletes all old generations of all profiles in /nix/var/nix/profiles by invoking nix-env --delete-generations old on all profiles. Of course, this makes rollbacks to previous configurations impossible.

refsection.title: Example
refsection.para:
To delete from the Nix store everything that is not used by the current generations of each profile, do
$ nix-collect-garbage -d
